title: Added skiaharp to a cross-platform net standard project but wont build
body:
I received the following error when building a VS 2017 C# cross-platform net standard project:
Warning	NU1701	Package 'SkiaSharp.Views 1.60.0' was restored using '.NETFramework,Version=v4.6.1' instead of the project target framework '.NETStandard,Version=v2.0'. This package may not be fully compatible with your project.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body: That is correct, the "SkiaSharp.Views" is a platform-specific project. If you are building a Xamarin.Forms app, then you need to install the "SkiaSharp.Views.Forms" package.
